lead_paragraph: Hong Kong’s Irfan Ahmed was barred for two and a half years for breaking anti-corruption rules by failing to report approaches by a suspected match-fixer.

headline.main: Irfan Ahmed Given Suspension for Breaking Corruption Rules

snippet: Hong Kong’s Irfan Ahmed was barred for two and a half years for breaking anti-corruption rules by failing to report approaches by a suspected match-fixer.
abstract: Hong Kong cricketer Irfan Ahmed is suspended for two and a half years  for declining to report being approached by suspected match-fixer.
